title: PEcAn Package for Integration of FATES Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.FATES r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.FATES in R install.packages('PEcAn.FATES') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/fates")

title: met2model for FATES — met2model.FATES
text: met2model wrapper FATES

title: met2model for FATES — met2model.FATES
code: met2model.FATES(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   lst = 0,   lat,   lon,   overwrite = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE,   ... )

title: met2model for FATES — met2model.FATES
text: .path location disk inputs stored .prefix prefix input output files outfolder location disk outputs stored start_date start date data downloaded end_date end date data downloaded lst timezone offset GMT hours lat, lon latitude longitude site decimal degrees overwrite existing files overwritten verbose function verbose (year start_year:end_year) ... additional arguments, currently ignored

what: Code to convert FATES netcdf output into into CF standard — model2netcdf.FATES
title: Code to convert FATES netcdf output into into CF standard — model2netcdf.FATES
text: Code convert FATES netcdf output CF standard

title: Code to convert FATES netcdf output into into CF standard — model2netcdf.FATES
code: model2netcdf.FATES(   outdir,   sitelat,   sitelon,   start_date,   end_date,   vars_names,   pfts )

title: Code to convert FATES netcdf output into into CF standard — model2netcdf.FATES
text: outdir Location FATES model output (e.g. path single ensemble output) sitelat Latitude site sitelon Longitude site start_date Start time simulation, string end_date End time simulation, string vars_names Names Selected variables PEcAn format, (e.g. c("","")) pfts named vector PFT numbers names PFT names

title: Code to convert FATES netcdf output into into CF standard — model2netcdf.FATES

title: PEcAn.FATES 1.8.1
text: model2netcdf.FATES longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.FATES 1.8.0
text: PEcAn.FATES now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.

title: PEcAn.FATES 1.8.0
text: met2model.FATES now produces three monthly files, including precipitation, solar radiation temperature+humidity model2netcdf.FATES now turns monthly PFT level output grid level output variables FATES yearly file PEcAn format Added new arguments model2netcdf.FATES: site location, start/end dates, vars, pfts

title: PEcAn.FATES 1.8.0
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Prior point changes tracked main CHANGELOG PEcAn repository.
